title: Video: Watch EVERY weekend EPL goal
text:
Premier League wrap: Manchester derby draw, Liverpool concede late equaliser, Harry Kane hat-trick, Sunderland beat Newcastle Jack Bezants, AP FOX SPORTS Premier League wrap: Manchester derby draw, Liverpool concede late equaliser, Harry Kane hat-trick, Sunderland beat Newcastle Jack Bezants, AP FOX SPORTS EPL Sunday goals: Round 10 2:22 
EPL: All the goals from Sunday's EPL action October 26th 2015 3 hours ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Football/EPL/ 
MANCHESTER United and Manchester City played out a 0-0 draw in the Premier League on Sunday, while Tottenham surged to a big victory at Bournemouth. 
Also, Jurgen Klopp was denied a first victory as Liverpool manager when Sadio Mane scored a late goal to earn Southampton a 1-1 draw at Anfield. 
At Old Trafford, United went closest to winning against City when substitute Jesse Lingard turned a high ball from Anthony Martial onto the crossbar before Chris Smalling had a low shot turned around the post by Joe Hart. EPL Saturday night goals 4:06 
EPL: All 13 goals from Saturday night's Premier League action. October 25th 2015
